basic.blooming: Flowering period June-July, fruiting period August-September
basic.color: Flower color white, pink, fruit color blue, red

maintenance.soil: Slightly acidic sandy soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, grows in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
